title: Provide Shipping Notification
description: An online order is picked up by the shipping carrier. The system needs to notify the customer.

tasks.description: The shipping carrier scans the package, and the data is sent to the retailer's order management system.
tasks.expected_outcome: The system receives a status update that the order is now in transit.

tasks.description: The system automatically updates the order status to 'Shipped'.
The system automatically sends a 'Your order has shipped!' email to the customer, including the tracking number.
tasks.expected_outcome: The customer is proactively notified and can track their package.
